wield_node.description: [string]Name of the node on the wielder that this equipment should be attached to when wielded.

wield_node_rotation_offset.description: If set, this rotation offset is applied when wielded.

wield_node_position_offset.description: If set, this position offset is applied when wielded.

holster_node.description: [string]Name of the node on the wielder that this equipment should be attached to when holstered.

holster_node_rotation_offset.description: If set, this rotation offset is applied when holstered.

holster_node_position_offset.description: If set, this position offset is applied when holstered.

holster_duration.description: The time it takes to holster this equipment.

wield_duration.description: The time it takes to wield this equipment.

pickup_duration.description: The time it takes to pickup this equipment.

wield_animation.description: [string]Name of the animation to play on the wielder when wielding.

pickup_animation.description: [string]Name of the animation to play on the wielder when picking up otherwise fallback to wield animation.

holster_animation.description: [string]Name of the animation to play on the wielder when holstering.

holster_duration_for_attach.description: The time it takes to have the equipment attach itself to the holster node when we start holstering.

wield_duration_for_attach.description: The time it takes to have the equipment attach itself to the wield node when we start wielding.

attach_lerp_time.description: Should we apply lerp to the attachable component when we wield/holster and if so, how long should it lerp for?

on_holster_animation_event.description: [string]Animation event to trigger when this entity is holstered.

wield_animation_self.description: [string]Name of the animation to play on the equipment when wielding.

pickup_animation_self.description: [string]Name of the animation to play on the equipment when picking up otherwise fallback to wield animation.

holster_animation_self.description: [string]Name of the animation to play on the equipment when holstering.

equipment_type.description: The category of this equipment piece, mostly used for AI purposes.

drop_mode.description: How the equipment should be treated when dropped.

drop_audio_event.description: [wwise]Audio event to trigger when getting rid of an equipment.

pickup_audio_event.description: [wwise]Audio event to trigger when putting on a new equipment.

weapon_switch_wield_audio_event.description: [wwise]Audio event to trigger when wielding the weapon.

weapon_switch_holster_audio_event.description: [wwise]Audio event to trigger when holstering the weapon.

pickup_ability.description: Ability to play when picking up from the ground. Currently only used for the avatar.

is_one_handed.description: [bool]Whether the weapon can be wielded in one hand or not.

allow_wield_on_ship.description: [bool]If the weapon can be wielded while on the ship, only intended use for debug purposes.

show_in_pickup_widget.description: [bool]True the equipment should be shown in the pickup widget.

holster_unit.description: [unit]Path to the holster unit. This is an additional unit to spawn on the holster node that doesn't move with the equipment. Useful for sheaths etc. Note that since it's an additional unit it's more expensive than building the sheath into the parent unit, so only use when needed.

hint_id.description: [string]Hint ID to trigger when equipping this equipment

equipment_wwise_index.description: the wwise item index for this equipment

backpack_wwise_index.description: the wwise item index for this backpack if it is a backpack

use_backpack_filled_switch.description: [bool]If yes set_switch would be called on audio source before pickup drop foley and impact sounds
